content.question: Sculptural reliefs at Angkor Wat depicting the Churning of the Ocean of Milk suggest that the patron of the complex may have

choices.label: intended to intimidate his audience by depicting acts of violence
aimed to produce a large number of heirs for posterity
desired to become godlike by achieving immortality
sought to gain enlightenment through meditative practices

content.answer: desired to become godlike by achieving immortality

unit.text: 8: South, East, and Southeast Asia, 300 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 8.2: Purpose and Audience in South, East, and Southeast Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
